title: Former Congressman Calls Daily Fantasy Sports a ‘Cauldron’ of Betting
text:
Former Congressman Calls Daily Fantasy Sports a ‘Cauldron’ of Betting 
Published By: Time - Today 
"[I]t is sheer chutzpah for a fantasy sports company to cite the law as a legal basis for existing"...
